name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a sleek, self-hostable platform for writing and publishing books or blogs. Built with Next.js, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, and MongoDB, it features a clean UI, built-in auth (Auth.js, Google, GitHub), and a powerful editor. Whether you're a blogger or author, Whiskers gets you writing fast—with zero setup friction.

name: WhyGui
description: WhyGUI is a minimal, custom GUI framework inspired by JSX, XML, and templating engines — but with zero HTML or CSS. Write simple .gui files using a declarative, tag-based syntax and render native desktop UIs using PySide6 (Qt). Perfect for designing rapid prototypes or dynamic UIs with full Python control.
